mapper.insert: insert into magnet_db (title, actress, subline, HD, magnet, num, types, date,series) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{magnet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into magnet_db
title,
actress,
subline,
HD,
magnet,
num,
types,
date,
series,
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{magnet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select m.title,m.actress,m.subline,m.HD,m.magnet,m.num,m.types,m.date,m.producer,m.id,m.series,vl.locate from magnet_db m left join magnet_videos_locate vl on m.num = vl.num order by m.date desc limit 1,50

select distinct count(magnet) as counts from magnet_db m
and m.num like '%' #{num} '%'
and m.actress like '%' #{actress} '%'
and m.types like '%' #{types} '%'
and m.subline like '%' #{subline} '%'
and m.HD like '%' #{HD} '%'
and m.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and m.producer like '%' #{producer} '%'
and #{date} >= m.date
and m.series like '%' #{series} '%'
and m.magnet is not null
order by m.date desc

select distinct m.title,m.actress,m.subline,m.HD,m.magnet,m.num,m.types,m.date,m.producer,m.series,s.selected,vl.locate from magnet_db m left join magnet_selected s on m.num=s.num left join magnet_videos_locate vl on m.num = vl.num
and m.actress like '%' #{actress} '%'
and m.num like '%' #{num} '%'
and m.types like '%' #{types} '%'
and m.subline like '%' #{subline} '%'
and m.HD like '%' #{HD} '%'
and m.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and m.producer like '%' #{producer} '%'
and #{date} >= m.date
and m.series like '%' #{series} '%'
and m.magnet is not null
order by m.date desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}
select distinct m.title,m.actress,m.subline,m.HD,m.magnet,m.num,m.types,m.date,m.producer,m.series from magnet_db m where m.types like '%' #{type} '%' limit 1,50

select distinct m.title,m.actress,m.subline,m.HD,m.magnet,m.num,m.types,m.date,m.producer,m.series,s.selected from magnet_db m left join magnet_selected s on m.num = s.num
and m.actress like '%' #{actress} '%'
and m.num like '%' #{num} '%'
and m.subline like '%' #{subline} '%'
and m.HD like '%' #{HD} '%'
and m.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and m.producer like '%' #{producer} '%'
and #{date} >= m.date
and m.series like '%' #{series} '%'
and m.num in ( select distinct t.num from magnet_type2 t where t.types in
#{typesArr}
)
and m.magnet is not null
order by m.date desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}

select distinct count(*) from magnet_db m
and m.num like '%' #{num} '%'
and m.actress like '%' #{actress} '%'
and m.subline like '%' #{subline} '%'
and m.HD like '%' #{HD} '%'
and m.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and m.producer like '%' #{producer} '%'
and #{date} >= m.date
and m.series like '%' #{series} '%'
and m.num in ( select distinct t.num from magnet_type2 t where t.types in
#{typesArr}
)
and m.magnet is not null
order by m.date desc
SELECT distinct types FROM magnet_type2 limit 100
select distinct num from magnet_videos_locate where locate is not null
